phraseList.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Believe you can and you are halfway there
Today is gonna be the day that they're gonna throw it back to you.
Go shorty, it's your birthday, we gonna party like it's yo birthday.
Bass! How low can you go? Death row, what a brother knows.
phraseList.trivia: Song: Bring The Noise, Public Enemy

phraseList.text: You may think that I’m a dreamer. But I’m not the only one.
Hello Darkness My Old Friend. I’ve Come To Talk With You Again…
phraseList.trivia: Song: The Sounds Of Silence, Simon and Garfunkel

phraseList.text: Get your stinking paws off me, you damned dirty ape.
phraseList.trivia: - Charleston Heston, Planet of the Apes

phraseList.text: Mrs.Robinson, you're trying to seduce me. Aren't you?
They may take our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!
The first rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.
You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?
Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You're my only hope.
phraseList.trivia: - Carrie Fisher. Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

phraseList.text: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye
phraseList.trivia: From: The "Little Prince", by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

phraseList.text: I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart: I am, I am, I am.
phraseList.trivia: From: "The Bell Jar", by Sylvia Plath

phraseList.text: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
When you play the game of thrones you win or you die. There is no middle ground.
phraseList.trivia: From: A Game of Thrones, by George R.R. Martin

phraseList.text: And now, cried Max, let the wild rumpus start!
phraseList.trivia: From: "Where the Wild Things Are", by Maurice Sendak

phraseList.text: It is nothing to die; it is dreadful not to live.
phraseList.trivia: From: " Les Miserables", by Victor Hugo

phraseList.text: Very few castaways can claim to have survived so long at sea as Mr. Patel, and none in the company of an adult Bengal tiger.
phraseList.trivia: From "The Life of Pi", by Yann Martel

phraseList.text: Clunky Clarissa, all clingy and clueless,left California and now she is shoeless.
phraseList.trivia: From "The Alphabet from A to Y With Bonus Letter Z!", by Steve Martin

phraseList.text: George and Harold were usually responsible kids. Whenever anything bad happened, George and Harold were usually responsible.
phraseList.trivia: From "Captain Underpants and the Attack of the Talking Toilets", by Dav Pilkey

phraseList.text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose.
phraseList.trivia: From "Oh, the Places You'll Go!", by Dr. Seuss

phraseList.text: I shall find out thousands and thousands of things!
phraseList.trivia: From "The Secret Garden", by Frances Hodgson Burnett

phraseList.text: Why, sometimes I’ve believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast
phraseList.trivia: From "Through the Looking Glass", by Lewis Carroll

phraseList.text: I invented a new word! Plagiarism!
Russian dolls are so full of themselves.
Never trust atoms; they make up everything.
I did not think orthopedic shoes would help, but I stand corrected.
Blunt pencils are really pointless.
One of the cows didn’t produce milk today. It was an udder failure.
A dung beetle walks into a bar and asks, ‘Is this stool taken?
Pollen is what happens when flowers can’t keep it in their plants.
Geology rocks, but geography’s where it’s at.
I went to buy some camo pants but could’t find any.
My friend’s bakery burned down last night. Now his business is toast.
She asked why I was breathing so heavily. I wasn't.
There was a picture of my phone of me sleeping. I live alone
Don't look behind you. It doesn't like to be seen.
Alone in my room, I sneezed softly. 'Bless you,' someone said.
I heard screams echo all around me. I'm deaf.
There's a girl standing outside my window. The only problem is I live on the seventh floor.
I can't move, breathe, speak or hear and it's so dark all the time. If i knew it would be this lonely, I would have been cremated instead.
It's peanut butter jelly time.
All your base are belong to us
I dont always play Revocalize, but when I do I complete all phrases first try.
Chocolate Rain, Some stay dry and others feel the pain
Once a cobra bit Chuck Norris’ leg. After five days of excruciating pain, the cobra died.
Never gonna give you up, Never gonna let you down, Never gonna run around and desert you.
There is something wrong with my cell phone. It doesn't have your number in it.
If I could rearrange the alphabet, I’d put ‘U’ and ‘I’ together.
Are you a parking ticket? Because you’ve got FINE written all over you.
Do you believe in love at first sight—or should I walk by again?
It’s a good thing I have my library card because I am totally checking you out.
Four score and seven years ago…
And so, my fellow Americans: ask not what your country can do for you—ask what you can do for your country.
I did not have sexual relations with that woman
It is a riddle, wrapped in a mystery, inside an enigma
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe! You have to make it fall.
Susie works in a shoeshine shop. Where she shines she sits, and where she sits she shines
A skunk sat on a stump and thunk the stump stunk, but the stump thunk the skunk stunk-
Where’s the peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked?
You know New York, you need New York, you know you need unique New York
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream
I have got a date at a quarter to eight; I’ll see you at the gate, so don’t be late.
If a dog chews shoes, whose shoes does he choose?
